articles.title: Wendy Williams diagnosed with aphasia and dementia - CNN
articles.description: Former talk show host Wendy Williams has been diagnosed with progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia.
articles.content:
Former talk show host Wendy Williams has been diagnosed with progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia, according to representatives for Williams.
The news was shared in a press release on Thu… [+2416 chars]
